author: civanch
body:
#### PR description:
Flag of LHC transport is set to "True", which means transport to PPS protons scattered to small angles.

This PR is applied only to Run-3 pp WFs, not to PbPb and not to Phase-2.
No effect on CPU and memory is expected. 
 
#### PR validation:
WF 11634.0 + validation by PPS expects

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:
no
title: Enable PPS simulation for Run-3
